name: Minesweeper with tools
description:
A simple Minesweeper-inspired game with some improvements.
Works in browser on any device. Controls - left mouse button / touch.
Key features:

  • You can play minesweeper not playing minesweeper but just poking mouse/screen to win!
  • Now you have tools to overcome 50/50 or any other problem
  • It has protagonist (but it's barely better than original smile-man)
